timeline.message:
Merge pull request #2 from apache/master

merge master

timeline.bodyText:
There is something wrong with the logic.
It should be the default value that the server stores when the client is not registered with the server.
timeline.author: liutaohua

timeline.bodyText: There may be a bug here, because the value stored by the server does not necessarily change when an error is encountered, but the local cached zoneId does
timeline.author: liutaohua

timeline.message: Merge branch 'timezone' of github.com:Alima777/incubator-iotdb into timezone

timeline.bodyText:
So we have to fill a null to the constructor of SessionPool if we don't want to set timezone, right?
I think we'd better don't change these tests and add an extra test of setting timezone.
timeline.author: HTHou

replies.bodyText: Not Exactly. We can use a constructor which doesn't need a timezone parameter instead.
replies.author: Alima777
